mapper.insert: insert into comments (comment_cno, comment_content, comment_writer, comment_write_time, bno) values (comment_seq.nextval, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate, #{bno})
mapper.select: select comment_cno as cno, comment_content as content, comment_writer as writer, to_char(comment_write_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as writeTime, bno from comments where bno = #{bno} order by comment_write_time desc
mapper.delete: delete from comments where comment_cno = #{cno} and comment_writer = #{loginId}
